TABLE.NAME: assignsubmission_coversheet
TABLE.COMMENT: Core assignment coversheet submission table requried to work with the assign module.

FIELD.NAME: submissiondate
FIELD.COMMENT: The time set to override the assign submission timemodified field.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this onlinetext submission.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this online text submission relates to.

KEY.NAME: submission
KEY.COMMENT: The submission this online text submission relates to.

KEY.NAME: scanid
KEY.COMMENT: This field relates the assign submission with the scan system.
